| location       = * Occasionally available at [Cuitztli's Exotic Herbs](/cuitztlisExoticHerbs/) in [Periki's Overlook](/perikisOverlook/). Some suggestion that when you have looked at a weapon or armor enchantment and you are missing only this ingredient, Cuitzili may have it.
* [Cignath Mór](/cignathMor/): Dropped by the [Kraken](/kraken/) fought when defying Galawain during [Overgrowth](/overgrowth/) (2-3x).
* [Ori o Koīki](/oriOKoiki/): Sold by [Kipeha](/kipeha/).
* [Ori o Koīki](/oriOKoiki/) (Sanctum) Found in chest from Chieftain's Bedchamber (x3)
* [Guild Ruins](/guildRuins/): Dropped by [Scyorielaphas](/scyorielaphas/) (5x).
* [Ashen Maw](/ashenMaw/): Dropped by [Jadaferlas the Ancient](/jadaferlasTheAncient/) (5x).
